CustomField.formula: IF( Market_Value__c > Agreement_Value__c, IMAGE("/img/samples/flag_red.gif", "Red Flag"), IF( Market_Value__c < Agreement_Value__c, IMAGE("/img/samples/flag_green.gif", "Green Flag"), IF( Market_Value__c == Agreement_Value__c, IMAGE("/img/samples/flag_yellow.gif", "Orange Flag"), null ) ) )
CustomField.label: Deviation
